personal.title: Front-End Developer

experience.summary: Develop slot games using Cocos engine
responsibilities: Lead kick-start meetings with related teams and identify conflicts between game features display and data records for BE-FE contracts
Break down tasks to estimate required time, update Jira tickets, and assign tasks to team members
Contract with Back-end to define new fields in response data for project features
Initialize project repos with base source code and develop features in JavaScript/TypeScript
Transform art team's designs into UI elements in Cocos Creator and implement animation logic
Deploy to staging and production environments (web lobby and mobile devices)
Optimize game performance including drawcall and network requests
Debug mobile device issues using Xcode and Android Studio
Work with QC team to identify and fix bugs until project is deemed releasable
Maintain legacy projects and migrate to newer Cocos versions per client requirements
Build custom tools using Node.js for file manipulation and Chrome Extensions for team support
Contribute to and maintain base source code repository
